tool_description: Identifies potential conflicts of interest between authors and reviewers based on institutional, collaborative, and personal relationships.

conflict_types.description: Types of conflicts to check: institutional, collaboration, advisee, family, financial

collaboration_window.description: Years to look back for collaboration conflicts

institutional_strictness.description: Level of institutional conflict checking: strict, moderate, lenient

error_messages: Invalid conflict types: Use combinations of [institutional, collaboration, advisee, family, financial].
Collaboration window out of range: Must be between 1 and 20 years.
Invalid strictness level: Use one of [strict, moderate, lenient].
Invalid author or reviewer IDs: Some provided identifiers do not exist in the database.
Too many authors or reviewers: Limit to 20 authors and 100 reviewers for processing efficiency.
usage: Provide author_ids and reviewer_ids to check for conflicts. Configure conflict_types, collaboration_window, and institutional_strictness to adjust detection sensitivity.

conflict_matrix.description: Boolean array indicating conflicts between each author-reviewer pair

clean_reviewers.description: Reviewer IDs with no conflicts detected

conflict_summary.description: Summary of conflict detection results and recommendations
